1.text: Hear, you children, the instruction of a father, and attend to know understanding.

2.text: For I give you good doctrine, forsake you not my law.

3.text: For I was my fatherâ€™s son, tender and only beloved in the sight of my mother.

4.text: He taught me also, and said to me, Let your heart retain my words: keep my commandments, and live.

5.text: Get wisdom, get understanding: forget it not; neither decline from the words of my mouth.

6.text: Forsake her not, and she shall preserve you: love her, and she shall keep you.

7.text: Wisdom is the principal thing; therefore get wisdom: and with all your getting get understanding.

8.text: Exalt her, and she shall promote you: she shall bring you to honor, when you do embrace her.

9.text: She shall give to your head an ornament of grace: a crown of glory shall she deliver to you.

10.text: Hear, O my son, and receive my sayings; and the years of your life shall be many.

11.text: I have taught you in the way of wisdom; I have led you in right paths.

12.text: When you go, your steps shall not be straitened; and when you run, you shall not stumble.

13.text: Take fast hold of instruction; let her not go: keep her; for she is your life.

14.text: Enter not into the path of the wicked, and go not in the way of evil men.

15.text: Avoid it, pass not by it, turn from it, and pass away.

16.text: For they sleep not, except they have done mischief; and their sleep is taken away, unless they cause some to fall.

17.text: For they eat the bread of wickedness, and drink the wine of violence.

18.text: But the path of the just is as the shining light, that shines more and more to the perfect day.

19.text: The way of the wicked is as darkness: they know not at what they stumble.

20.text: My son, attend to my words; incline your ear to my sayings.

21.text: Let them not depart from your eyes; keep them in the middle of your heart.

22.text: For they are life to those that find them, and health to all their flesh.

23.text: Keep your heart with all diligence; for out of it are the issues of life.

24.text: Put away from you a fraudulent mouth, and perverse lips put far from you.

25.text: Let your eyes look right on, and let your eyelids look straight before you.

26.text: Ponder the path of your feet, and let all your ways be established.

27.text: Turn not to the right hand nor to the left: remove your foot from evil.
